# Vehicle propulsion type
<!--- THIS FILE IS GENERATED PLEASE DO NOT EDIT IT DIRECTLY --->

A vehicle propulsion type allows us to categorize vehicles according to their propulsion method (electric, thermal, hybrid, manual, etc.)

<OH code="vehiclePropulsionType"/>




## Required Properties {#properties-mandatory}
    
### Code {#code}

The unique code for the vehicle propulsion type

*Technical name:* ```code```
<PH code="vehiclePropulsionType:code"/>

### Color {#color}

The color associated with the vehicle's propulsion type for display

*Technical name:* ```color```
<PH code="vehiclePropulsionType:color"/>

### Last name {#name}

The name of the vehicle propulsion type

*Technical name:* ```name```
<PH code="vehiclePropulsionType:name"/>
